bill.summary:
Building United States Infrastructure and Leveraging Development Act or the BUILD Act
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $15 billion to $20.8 billion the national limitation on the amount of tax-exempt highway or surface freight transfer facility bonds.
